<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Widget Details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/widget/projects/slug/{projectSlug}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves project configuration y la información de marca necesarias para incrustar el widget de AI Findr en sitios web externos. Este endpoint proporciona todas las opciones de estilo, ajustes de comportamiento y opciones de personalización necesarias para mostrar un widget de asistente IA completamente personalizado.

**Widget Integration:**
This endpoint is the foundation for widget integration, providing the complete configuration needed to embed AI Findr in your website. The response includes project metadata, brand visual identity, and widget behavior settings.

**Branding Response Fields:**
- `logoImage`: Your organization's logo URL to display in the widget
- `brandColor`: Main brand color in hex format for widget theming
- `sloganLineOne/sloganLineTwo`: Custom welcome messages displayed to users
- `searchPlaceholder`: Placeholder text shown in the input field
- `searchSuggestions`: Array of suggested queries shown to users
- `showSources`: Whether to show source links in AI responses
- `widgetConfig`: Detailed style configuration for widget appearance and behavior

**Usage:**
Use this endpoint during widget initialization to fetch branding and configuration. The response contains all the visual and behavior settings needed to create a consistent, branded experience that matches your organization's identity.

**Default Values:**
The endpoint returns default values for any branding options that haven't been customized, ensuring the widget always has a complete configuration.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Project slug identifier para la integración del widget","in":"path","name":"projectSlug","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
